[b][color=white]Policy Against Xbox Products Has Been Lifted[/color][/b] 
In 2015, a new policy was released via [url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=4830930]this thread[/url] outlining the prohibition against the sale of Xbox products such as consoles, live codes, and gift cards. This new policy also brought the closure of the Xbox Live Membership Codes forum. However, in a turn of events this past Wednesday, [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][b][color=#ff3eab]Omniscient[/color][/b][/url] made a comment on the thread stating that Hack Forums is easing up on the policy due to gift cards now being allowed.
[i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=4830930&pid=55944035#pid55944035] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Genetic Surgery Performed on Embryo to Remove Life Threatening Disease [/color][/b] 
Researchers at the Sun Yat-sen University in China have successfully performed DNA editing surgery on an embryo. They were able to alter a single "letter" out of millions contained within the genetic code to remove the genetic disease beta-thalassemia. Base editing of DNA changes one of the four building blocks: adenine, cytosine, guanine, and thymine which are commonly represented as their first letters. According to the team "We are the first to demonstrate the feasibility of curing genetic disease in human embryos by base editor system." They are hoping this procedure will bring treatment to many terrible genetic diseases.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.com/news/health-41386849]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Life-Preserving Color-Changing Tattoos may Soon be a Reality[/color][/b] 
This one goes out to the ink heads out there, your art can now serve a possibly life saving function. Two postdoctoral fellows, led by Katia Vega, were looking to create the next generation of wearable technology. They were looking for a way to usher in a new generation of wearable technology, with the current generation being unable to integrate with the body and relatively short battery life seamlessly.. They were all surprised where their research took them. Their dermal abyss tattoo ink changes color based on the composition of certain fluids within the body. Most notably they can be used to measure glucose levels, greatly helping those living with diabetes. They also have temporary and permanent versions of the tattoos for those of you afraid of commitment. Lastly, the team is now working on completing work on an app to interpret the coloring of the ink more accurately.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://news.harvard.edu/gazette/story/2017/09/harvard-researchers-help-develop-smart-tattoos/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Gamers may Have a leg up in the Classroom[/color][/b] 
At the Ruhr-Universität Bochum, neuropsychologists set gamers and non-gamers against each other in a little learning competition. Those participating in the study were shown a random combination of cue cards with symbols on them. Subjects were then asked to predict if it is going to rain or be sunny out depending on the cards. Immediately after answering, they were told if their predictions were or weren't correct and given feedback. Sooner or later they all began learning how to correctly predict the weather based on the symbols. However, the gamers were able to grasp the concept faster in almost all cases, leading the team to their conclusion. I'm not sure how much faith I put in something like this myself, but it is still an interesting read nonetheless.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://news.rub.de/english/press-releases/2017-09-29-neuroscience-gamers-have-advantage-learning]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Catalonia Wins Blood-Soaked Right to Statehood[/color][/b] 
It has been a long time to come, but Catalonia has finally successfully voted and decided on independence. This road to freedom has been anything but trivial for Catalonia; it was instead paved with the blood of innocents. According to the Catalan government, over 800 people were injured during the voting. Local law enforcement was raiding all polling stations, in an effort to prevent this historic vote. There is an even chilling video of riot police ripping a woman out of a station embedded in the source article, her blood littering the white tile. In the end, however, it was all for naught. The final count of those that managed to vote was 90% being for independence.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.bbc.com/news/world-europe-41463719]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Fire is About to Rain Down on Panama Island[/color][/b] 
Over 11,000 residents are ready to evacuate their homes in the wake of the eruption. According to local accounts, globs of lava can be seen flying upwards of 300 feet from the volcano every few seconds. In a crisis like this, the most important thing is getting water to those in the afflicted area because of the inevitable hike in temperatures. The local government hopes to have all citizens evacuated before October 6. Rumbling from the Manaro Voui volcano were audible since the beginning of September.  [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.foxnews.com/world/2017/10/01/vanuatu-volcano-erupts-11000-prepare-to-evacuate.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Amazon's Echo Spot is a Sneaky Way to Get a Camera Into Your Bedroom[/color][/b]
Amazon disclosed six new equipment items at its unexpected occasion in Seattle yesterday; however, the Echo Spot is the cynosure. Many people think the Echo Spot is charming; a little wake-up timer that is intended to sit beside your bed. While all the attention is on what the Echo Spot resembles, recall that Amazon is utilizing the Spot as an exceptionally shrewd method for making you comfortable with having a camera in your room. It's likewise a camera that will most likely be pointing precisely at your bed. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2017/9/28/16378472/amazons-echo-spot-camera-in-your-bedroom]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]OnePlus 5 Spotted With Android 8.0 Oreo on Geekbench, Rollout Seems Imminent[/color][/b]
The OnePlus 5 has been spotted running Android 8.0 Oreo on the Geekbench benchmarking stage. The posting apparently affirms that OnePlus may have begun testing the new form of Android and clues at the up and coming dispatch of the update. 
OnePlus prodded the Android 8.0 Oreo refresh for the Oneplus 5 a week ago, recommending that the update will touch base in December. The Geekbench posting, in any case, suggests that the Oreo update may arrive sooner than that. OnePlus as of late revealed the OxygenOS 4.5.10 for the OnePlus 5 with strength fixes and camera upgrades. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.digit.in/mobile-phones/oneplus-5-spotted-with-android-80-oreo-on-geekbench-launch-seems-imminent-37340.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds Gets Its Own Company[/color][/b] 
Bluehole has created a subsidiary that will focus primarily on the game of PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds. The company is named PUBG Corp, and the CEO of the company is the lead developer of the game, Chang Han Kim as well as Woonghee Cho. With that being said, this allows the benefit of a group of people hired to focus on the game itself, rather than working on other projects that may interfere with the process of dishing new things out for PUBG. To make it official, the company already has a headquarters office in the United States. In the future, PUBG Corp plans on also making offices in Japan and even the Europe. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/playerunknowns-battlegrounds-gets-its-own-company-pubg-corp/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]New Red Dead Redemption 2 Trailer Released[/color][/b] 
A video was released by Rockstar for the upcoming wild west open-world sequel, Red Dead Redemption 2. Showcasing beautiful graphics, the teaser video starts off high in the mountains with cloudy, but beautiful skies. Showcasing different characters, weapons and sceneries, you get a glimpse of what the game has to offer. At the end of the teaser, you are welcomed with "Spring 2018. It was already confirmed that the game would be released next year, but now we have a timeframe around March through May. You can check the trailer [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JXZKLfLZkv8]here[/url] if you have seen it yet. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/new-red-dead-redemption-2-trailer-released-still-n/1100-6453653/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Cuphead: Creating a Game That Looks Like a 1930s Cartoon[/color][/b] 
This popular new game is currently popular on the Twitch streaming app. What game is it exactly? Cuphead. In this game, you get to play as a character that looks like he is from a 1930s cartoon. What is even more amazing is that all the art you see in the game is hand drawn. This was to speed up the process of getting the game out faster. It has an American art style to it, and the game is going for $20. It has a sidescroller arcade style feel to it. Your character has a finger gun that you use to blast off and kill enemies. You run from side to side which is where the sidescroller arcade style comes in and you basically just run and gun. Originally the game started its development in 2010. In 2014, it announced its arrival of coming soon. The game is released on PC and Xbox. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2017/9/28/16378364/cuphead-art-design-1930s-animation]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
